meanings.sent1: She suggested a new game to play at the party.
meanings.sent2: He suggested we take a break after studying for hours.
meanings.sent3: The cat suggested it was time for dinner by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds suggested a storm was approaching.
meanings.sent5: The teacher suggested a fun way to remember the math formula.

meanings.sent1: His smile suggested he was happy with the surprise.
meanings.sent2: The closed sign suggested the store was not open for business.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious note suggested a secret treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The footprints in the sand suggested someone had been there before.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cookies suggested Mom was baking in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Serve as a reason for recommending or suggesting
meanings.sent1: The positive reviews suggested the movie was worth watching.
meanings.sent2: Her experience suggested she was the best candidate for the job.
meanings.sent3: The delicious smell of the bakery suggested we buy some treats.
meanings.sent4: The map suggested a shortcut through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's advice suggested a healthier lifestyle for better health.
